action.name: Set text
action.param: zeropad(hour,2) & ":" & zeropad(minute,2) & ":" & zeropad(second,2) & newline & totalSeconds & newline & sineTotalSeconds & newline & int(skyR) & "," & int(SkyG) & "," & int(SkyB)

action.name: Set text
action.param: left(str(timeLerp),5) & newline & clockSegment & " - " & Sunny.At(0,clockSegment) & newline & "midBrightness = " & right(str(int(midParallaxBrightness)),2) & newline & "farBrightness = " & right(str(int(farParallaxBrightness)),2)
